code: import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';import{addQuizId}from'../topics/topicsSlice';export var quizzesSlice=createSlice({name:'quizzes',initialState:{quizzes:{}},reducers:{addQuiz:function addQuiz(state,action){var _action$payload=action.payload,quizId=_action$payload.quizId,name=_action$payload.name,topicId=_action$payload.topicId,cardIds=_action$payload.cardIds;state.quizzes[quizId]={id:quizId,name:name,topicId:topicId,cardIds:cardIds};return state;}}});export var addQuizAddQuizId=function addQuizAddQuizId(quiz){var quizId=quiz.quizId,topicId=quiz.topicId;return function(dispatch){dispatch(quizzesSlice.actions.addQuiz(quiz));dispatch(addQuizId({quizId:quizId,topicId:topicId}));};};var addQuiz=quizzesSlice.actions.addQuiz;export{addQuiz};export default quizzesSlice.reducer;export var selectQuizzes=function selectQuizzes(state){return state.quizzes.quizzes;};
